solution_line_template: 5 less than {total_hoots_per_minute} hoots per minute is {total_hoots_per_minute}-{hoots_less}=<<{total_hoots_per_minute}-{hoots_less}={heard_hoots_per_minute}>>{heard_hoots_per_minute} hoots per minute.

If one barnyard owl makes {hoots_per_owl} hoot sounds per minute, then {heard_hoots_per_minute} hoots per minute are coming from {heard_hoots_per_minute}/{hoots_per_owl}=<<{heard_hoots_per_minute}/{hoots_per_owl}={number_of_owls}>>{number_of_owls} barnyard owls.
